basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Joan E. Bottger Endowed Scholarship for Kinesiology
basic_information.committee_name: Dr. Joan E. Bottger Endowed Scholarship for Kines

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are preparing to teach Physical Education & Health in the school or university setting. Eligibility Requirements Student preparing to teach Physical Education & Health in the school or university setting Admitted to teacher education program & accepted for student teaching Active member of the UCO Kinesiology & Health Studies major club and/or Physical Education Majors club (PEM) & the Oklahoma Association of Health, Physical Education, Recreation & Dance (OAHPERD) Involved in Kinesiology & Health Studies Departmental activities Demonstrate commitment to a physically active & physically fit lifestyle Demonstrate appropriate behavior reflective of a professional person Financial need to be considered Transfer students & graduate students may be considered for these scholarships but preference will be given to undergraduate students who have been at UCO for all or most of their undergraduate years Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
